channel.title: Roles on Kayzor Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Roles on Kayzor Documentation

item.title: List Roles
item.description: 3.1 List roles System lists all available user roles in table with parameters: ID (ID of role) Name (name of role)

item.title: Edit Roles
item.description: 3.2 Edit roles System allows you to edit role parameters: Name Slug Permissions

item.title: Create Roles
item.description: 3.3 Create roles System allows to create roles for certain accessibility and functionality stack. In creation of role admin can assign certain permission to do certain task in sportbook business.
